about_the_game:
Delirium is a first-person psychological horror walking simulator with a focus on building tension. The game takes approximately 30-45 minutes to complete.

Gameplay

Explore a suburban house that reacts to your every move. Watch analog horror style TV broadcasts. Solve light puzzles such as unlocking doors and accessing new areas.

The game is a linear experience with a focus on atmosphere and tension. It is NOT narratively or mechanically complex - it's more like a terrifying carnival ride. If that's what you're looking for, then this is the right place.

Features

  • No cheap jumpscares

    Nothing is chasing you and nothing will jump out at you

  • Physical interactions

    Interact with doors and objects with immersive amnesia-like controls

  • TV broadcasts

    Watch analog horror inspired TV broadcasts

  • High-quality 3D audio

    Enjoy an immersive horror soundscape

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Delirium

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Delirium is a psychological horror game set in a suburban house. After a mysterious explosion, reality begins to unravel.
